name: Lovely Planet OST
description:
Lovely Planet Original Soundtrack by Calum Bowen, now available on GOG!

Six tracks from the game and an extra remix in mp3 format!

Full Track List

01. Lovely Planet
02. Lovely City
03. Lovely Village
04. Lovely Forest
05. Lovely Swamp
06. Lovely Mountains
07. Lovely Forest (Maxo Fightermix)
